thread.title_full: Eiffel Lights - Review of Mercure Paris Centre Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: schmoosue
title: Eiffel Lights - Review
text:
fantastic setting right next to the eiffel tower,fantastic hotel,,great food and drink,,all staff friendly,,comfy rooms,first time in paris and the hotel the hotel couldnt do enough for us,,so helpful for trips too and you could book and get tickets for eveything ,,brilliant we will be back xx
Room Tip: get a room with a view''eiffel tower See more room tips
